snippet: Despite the governor's support for gay marriage, he said he did not bring the topic up when he met with the president on Tuesday.
abstract: Despite the governor's support for gay marriage, he said he did not bring the topic up when he met with the president on Tuesday.

headline.main: Cuomo Says Obama Must Make Own Decision on Same-Sex Marriage
